title: Topic 003 Question 015
body: You have 20 computers that run Linux.
You deploy a disconnected Azure Stack Hub integrated system.
You need to ensure that users on the Linux computers can manage their Azure Stack Hub resources by using Azure Command-Line Interface (CLI).
options: For each Linux computer, request a certificate from the integrated system.
Export the root certificate of the integrated system as a P7B file.
Request a new certificate for the integrated system.
Export the root certificate of the integrated system as a CER file.
